name: Arcana Domain
description: Gods of the Arcana domain oversee magic and its secrets.

1.name: Arcane Initiate
1.description: Gain proficiency in Arcana and two wizard cantrips, which count as cleric cantrips for you.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Arcane Abjuration
2.description: Use Channel Divinity to turn celestials, elementals, fey, or fiends; higher levels can banish them.

6.name: Spell Breaker
6.description: When you heal with a spell of 1st level or higher, you can end one spell of equal or lower level on the target.

8.name: Potent Spellcasting
8.description: Add your Wisdom modifier to the damage you deal with cleric cantrips.

17.name: Arcane Mastery
17.description: Choose four wizard spells of 6th to 9th level to add to your domain spells. They are always prepared.

choices.name: Arcana Domain Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Arcana Domain subclass
